page.title: 19A Day in the Life of Sylvia
page.content: Sylvia gets up at 6am,and has a cup of tea.After that she does her milk round, in Hulme Village.She comes back and has her breakfast. Then she feeds her 6 pigs and her 10 calves,and cleans them out. She comes back into the house and washes the breakfast dishes.Then the post comes and she opens it.After she has washed up she cleans the house and then she prepares the dinner for two men ,her daughter,herself and her Aunty across the road who is very ill. Sylvia has 10 cats ,because people come to her farm and just dump their cats there, deserting them.She takes them into her house and feeds them.She has a wash and gets changed to watch television.Apart from all this she is very busy answering the phone all day.
